original_title: Joe Morello - Natural Approach to Technique
overview: The Natural Approach to Technique" features: Various roll techniques including the "buzz," match grip vs. traditional stick positions, various sounds on the drum head, cross sticking, matching & choosing sticks, proper tuning, many unique exercises, "stone killers," practice pad usage, natural body movement, full stroke & control stroke, finger control, relaxation techniques, soloing and more. Plus live footage of the Dave Brubeck Quartet.
title: Joe Morello - Natural Approach to Technique
